Messages.Message: Hey guys! Watch me freak this kid out...
Yeah...Lenny gave me this weird amulet and now I can understand you.
Listen, I'm looking for my friend Gullivan. Have you seen him?
Maybe! Someone came through here not too long ago saying that they wished that they were a ghost.
He drank some awful-smelling liquid out of a vile and then went into the tomb over there.
Very well actually. You don't smell too good either, to be honest.
...Wow, okay. How do I get into the tomb?
You just go in. It's not like you're in a video game or something where this is a giant puzzle to solve.
...Ookay. I'm going to go try to find Gullivan.
